Job Title: Senior Software Developer (C#, WPF  Desktop applications)
Job Description: We re looking for the makers of tomorrow, the hardworking individuals ready to help Siemens transform entire industries, cities and even countries. Get to know us from the inside, develop your skills on the job. Join our Pune team to make difference!    What are my Job Responsibilities    You should have Handson with C#.Net, WPF desktop application development.   You should have Strong knowledge of C#, XAML, SQL.   You Should be able to effectively investigate reported software defects, debugging skills.   You need to have Proactive interaction with product owner and architects for technical clarifications and presentations.   You should be able to communicate clearly and effectively at various levels - intra team, inter group, spoken skills, written skills - including email, presentation and articulation skills.     What do I need to be Eligible for this Role    An engineering degree B.E/B.Tech/MCA/M.Tech/M.Sc.   6 - 10Years of Relevant experience in C#.Net, WPF desktop application development.   Experience in cloud application / Angular / HTML5 will be an added advantage.   Exposure to Building Automation domain would be an added advantage
PG: MCA in Computers, M.Tech in Electronics/Telecommunication, MS/M.Sc(Science) in Chemistry
